capabilities.name: list_coredumps
capabilities.description: List available coredumps in the system

capabilities.name: get_coredump_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific coredump

capabilities.name: extract_coredump
capabilities.description: Extract a coredump to a file

capabilities.name: get_coredump_config
capabilities.description: Get the current core dump configuration of the system

capabilities.name: set_coredump_enabled
capabilities.description: Enable or disable core dump generation

capabilities.name: get_stacktrace
capabilities.description: Get stack trace from a coredump using GDB
